achievements: Automated ETL testing for bank statements as volume scaled from 6 lakh to 4.5 crore transactions in a single year
Led testing for NACH-based EMI collection system handling ‚Çπ30 Cr/month; validated mandate creation, auto-debit, and failure logic

Developed end-to-end test automation for debt recommendation engine; eliminated manual testing, achieving 75% match rate
Maintained and optimized test suites for 6+ backend services (Java, TestNG, Rest Assured) and frontend modules (Playwright, TypeScript)
Built data-verification microservice for mail/NACH execution; integrated pre/post checks via Excel reports & Slack alerts
Automated 'Pay Now' feature handling ‚Çπ5 Cr/month in EMI payments; created robust test plans covering delays and validation logic
Conducted manual & exploratory testing for onboarding and digital signing on mobile web
Built Playwright + TypeScript automation suite for onboarding flows; covered form validations, e-signatures, and UI logic
Built BDD-based regression test suite for Talent Acquisition platform using pytest, pytest-BDD, and Selenium
Replaced manual testing with scalable automation frameworks, reducing regression testing time by 50%

story.title: My Story.
paragraphs: My journey as a Software Development Engineer in Test began with a passion for ensuring software quality and building robust test automation frameworks. I started my career at Eightfold AI as a QA Intern, where I learned the fundamentals of test automation and quality assurance.

After gaining valuable experience in BDD-based testing and Selenium automation, I joined Recur Club as an SDET Intern, where I had the opportunity to work on complex financial systems and payment flows.

Currently, I work as a Software Development Engineer in Test at Recur Club, where I've been instrumental in automating ETL testing for massive transaction volumes and building comprehensive test frameworks for critical financial systems.

Throughout my career, I've specialized in test automation, working with technologies like Playwright, Selenium, TestNG, and pytest. I've successfully handled testing for systems processing crores of transactions monthly.

I believe in continuous learning and staying updated with the latest testing methodologies and tools. My success comes from my ability to build scalable test frameworks, ensure data integrity, and deliver high-quality software solutions.

Currently, I'm focused on advancing test automation practices and contributing to the development of robust quality assurance processes. I love what I do, and I'm always excited to take on new testing challenges! üíú
